mapper.sql: id, number, auditor, creator, warehouseid, audittime, mainmid,amount,amount_handle,auditstatus,remark,shopid,opttime,operator,createdate,ftype
mapper.select: select ifnull(( SELECT ifnull(sum(f.amount),0)- ifnull(SUM(i.amount),0) quantity FROM t_erp_assembly_form f LEFT JOIN (select formid,SUM(amount) amount from t_erp_assembly_from_instock GROUP BY formid)i ON i.formid=f.id WHERE f.warehouseid=#{warehouseid,jdbcType=CHAR} AND f.ftype='ass' AND f.mainmid=#{materialid,jdbcType=CHAR} AND f.auditstatus IN (1,2) ),0)+ ifnull(( SELECT (ifnull(sum(f.amount),0)- ifnull(SUM(i.amount),0))*(e.amount/f.amount) quantity FROM t_erp_assembly_form f LEFT JOIN (select formid,SUM(amount) amount from t_erp_assembly_from_instock GROUP BY formid)i ON i.formid=f.id left join t_erp_assembly_form_entry e on e.formid=f.id WHERE f.warehouseid=#{warehouseid,jdbcType=CHAR} AND f.ftype='dis' AND e.materialid=#{materialid,jdbcType=CHAR} AND f.auditstatus IN (1,2) ),0)

select a.id,a.number,a.ftype,a.auditstatus,v.* from t_erp_assembly_form a LEFT join t_erp_material m on a.mainmid = m.id left join ( select entry.formid,
max(case when m2.sku like #{search,jdbcType=CHAR} then 1 else 0 end) subhave,
max( case when form.ftype='ass' then case when ifnull(i2.quantity,0) < (entry.amount/form.amount) then 1 else 0 end else case when i1.quantity>=form.amount then 0 else 1 end end ) needpo from t_erp_assembly_form_entry entry
left join t_erp_material m2 on m2.id=entry.materialid
left join t_erp_assembly_form form on entry.formid=form.id left join t_erp_inventory i1 on form.mainmid=i1.materialid and i1.warehouseid=form.warehouseid and i1.shopid=#{shopid,jdbcType=CHAR} and i1.`status` ='fulfillable' left join t_erp_inventory i2 on entry.materialid=i2.materialid and i2.warehouseid=entry.warehouseid and i2.`status` ='fulfillable' and i2.shopid=#{shopid,jdbcType=CHAR} where form.shopid=#{shopid,jdbcType=CHAR} and form.auditstatus=1 group by entry.formid ) v on v.formid=a.id where a.shopid=#{shopid,jdbcType=CHAR} and a.auditstatus in (1,2)
and (a.ftype= #{ftype,jdbcType=CHAR} )
and (m.sku like #{search,jdbcType=CHAR} or a.number like #{search,jdbcType=CHAR} or v.subhave=1)
order by a.ftype,a.auditstatus

select w.name warehouse,m.sku skuname,ifnull(p.location,p.url) image,m.name mname, a.*,i.quantity invqty from t_erp_assembly_form a left join t_erp_material m on m.id=a.mainmid LEFT JOIN t_erp_warehouse w on a.warehouseid = w.id left join t_picture p on p.id=m.image left join t_erp_inventory i on a.mainmid=i.materialid and i.warehouseid=a.warehouseid and i.shopid=a.shopid and i.`status` ='fulfillable' where a.id=#{id,jdbcType=CHAR};

select ta.id,ta.number number,ta.ftype,m.sku sku, ta.amount,u.name creator, ta.auditstatus auditstatus, ta.remark remark,ta.opttime opttime , v.needpo purchaseneed, v.hasqty,v.needin ,ta.createdate, p.location image,m.name,ta.amount_handle, w.name wname,w.id warehouseid, ifnull(ta.amount,0)-ifnull(ta.amount_handle,0) hashandle from t_erp_assembly_form ta left join t_erp_inventory i on ta.mainmid=i.materialid and i.warehouseid=ta.warehouseid and i.shopid=ta.shopid and i.`status` ='fulfillable' left join t_erp_warehouse w on w.id=ta.warehouseid LEFT JOIN t_userinfo u on ta.creator = u.id LEFT join t_erp_material m on ta.mainmid = m.id left join t_picture p on p.id=m.image left join ( select entry.formid, max( case when form.ftype='ass' then case when ifnull(i2.quantity,0) < (entry.amount/form.amount) then 1 else 0 end else case when i1.quantity>=form.amount then 0 else 1 end end ) needpo , max( case when form.ftype='ass' then case when ifnull(i3.quantity,0)+ifnull(i2.quantity,0) < (entry.amount/form.amount*(form.amount-ifnull(form.amount_handle,0))) then (entry.amount/form.amount*(form.amount-ifnull(form.amount_handle,0)))-(ifnull(i3.quantity,0)+ifnull(i2.quantity,0)) else 0 end else 0 end ) needin , min( case when form.ftype='ass' then ifnull(i2.quantity,0)/(entry.amount/(form.amount)) else case when i1.quantity>=form.amount then form.amount else 0 end end ) hasqty from t_erp_assembly_form form left join t_erp_assembly_form_entry entry on entry.formid=form.id left join t_erp_material m2 on m2.id=entry.materialid left join t_erp_inventory i1 on form.mainmid=i1.materialid and i1.warehouseid=form.warehouseid and i1.shopid=m2.shopid and i1.`status` ='fulfillable' left join t_erp_inventory i2 on entry.materialid=i2.materialid and i2.warehouseid=entry.warehouseid and i2.`status` ='fulfillable' and i2.shopid=m2.shopid left join t_erp_inventory i3 on entry.materialid=i3.materialid and i3.warehouseid=entry.warehouseid and i3.`status` = 'inbound_purchase' and i3.shopid=m2.shopid where form.mainmid=#{materialid,jdbcType=CHAR} AND form.auditstatus IN (1,2,3,4) group by entry.formid ) v on v.formid=ta.id
where ta.auditstatus IN (1,2,3,4) and ta.mainmid=#{materialid,jdbcType=CHAR}
ORDER BY ta.auditstatus asc,ta.createdate desc limit 3
ORDER BY ta.createdate desc limit 1
select ifnull(count(1),0) from t_erp_assembly_form where auditstatus=1 and shopid=#{shopid,jdbcType=CHAR}
select * from t_erp_assembly_form a where a.warehouseid = #{warehouseid,jdbcType=CHAR} and a.auditstatus in(0,1,2)

SELECT max(m.id) materialid, max(m.sku) sku, max(m.name) name, sum(t.amount) amount, t.warehouseid, max(w.name) wname, max(i.quantity) fulfillable, max(m.id) id, max(ifnull(p.location,p.url)) image FROM t_erp_assembly_form t LEFT JOIN t_erp_material m ON t.mainmid=m.id LEFT JOIN t_erp_warehouse w ON w.id=t.warehouseid LEFT JOIN t_erp_inventory i ON i.warehouseid=t.warehouseid AND i.materialid=m.id AND i.shopid=m.shopid AND i.`status`='fulfillable' LEFT JOIN t_picture p on p.id=m.image WHERE t.check_inv=#{runid,jdbcType=CHAR} and m.shopid=#{shopid,jdbcType=CHAR} group by t.warehouseid,t.mainmid;
